Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/10 2:17PM - Weve already picked up 4 inches of fresh snow and that's just the beginning! With snow showers sticking around through the evening, were on track to stack up several more inches and roll right into a powder packed Thursday. Tomorrow, 7 lifts are scheduled to spin at 9am, with the possibility of delays due to high winds. Were planning on 38 ways down, 36 of which will be getting some extra love from our groomers overnight. With all the fresh snow, the stoke is high for whats to come here at Stratton. Ill catch you bright and early for your morning report and our final snowfall tally!

Operations Update: Snowmaking is on a brief pause while Mother Nature does her thing, but will resume on Black Bear shortly. Upper Middlebrook has already seen several days of snowmaking, and well continue building out into Sun Bowl with the goal of opening access via Sunrise Express for the weekend.

Safety Tip: Please do not duck ropes and stay off closed terrain. Doing so risks getting your pass pulled.

Kids Ski Free Week is BACK! Now through December 12 skiers & riders under 17 can SKI FREE at Stratton! Whether you are first-timers or mini-pros, a free week of mountain fun is waiting. Dont miss out on this fantastic week! 

Want to go on an adventure of a lifetime? Well, you're in luck, our Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

The Nordic Center is now open for Snowshoeing! Enjoy a peaceful walk through 10km of trails with friends or family. Once more snow lands, well be chewing at the bit to get the Nordic Center up and running! 

The last day to buy an Ikon pass is December 11. Buy Now before its too late! With 60+ destinations worldwide, you can explore winter to its fullest, from backyard missions to bucket list dreams.

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
